definition: to hunt and arrest (fugitives)/to track down and arrest/a manhunt

sentences.english: The policemen were hunting gangsters in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 警察们正在森林中搜捕匪徒。

sentences.english: The moonshiners had been tipped off that they were about to be raided.
sentences.chinese: 烈酒走私者得到风声说将对他们开展搜捕。

sentences.english: The police are beating the town for the escapee.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在镇上搜捕那个逃犯。

sentences.english: A nationwide manhunt for an alleged child molester is over.
sentences.chinese: 一个全国搜捕骚扰儿童的行动告一段落。

sentences.english: Li Xinglin, the boss of the factory, has disappeared. The police are searching for him.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂的老板李某已经逃跑，警察现在在搜捕他。

sentences.english: Police and special counter-terrorism units have taken part in many raids across Punjab.
sentences.chinese: 警察和特种反恐部队参与了旁泽普省各地的多次搜捕。

sentences.english: A nationwide manhunt for an alleged child molester is over.
sentences.chinese: 一次对所谓未成年人性骚扰的全国性搜捕运动结束了。

sentences.english: Zhou Mohan underestimated the capacity of the joint man, he was not recommended for.
sentences.chinese: 周默涵低估了接头人的能力，他不建议大加搜捕。

sentences.english: Witch-hunts first appeared in large numbers in southern France and Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 在法国南部和瑞士，大规模搜捕女巫的行动开始出现。

sentences.english: One day the king returned home from a good raid. He ordered his trumpeters to play.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，国王进行大搜捕回来，他命令号手吹号。

sentences.english: The manhunt has become more intense.
sentences.chinese: 搜捕工作变得更加紧张。

sentences.english: The hunt has taken them from Spain to South America.
sentences.chinese: 德国警方的搜捕足迹从西班牙踏及到南美。

sentences.english: The raid is part of an intensifying Hamas crackdown on Fatah.
sentences.chinese: 这次搜捕行动是哈马斯加强镇压法塔赫的一部分。

sentences.english: Commander General Ghani says his forces are looking for Fazalullah.
sentences.chinese: 加尼将军说，他的军队正在搜捕法扎拉赫。

sentences.english: Three people are under arrest with investigators looking for a fourth.
sentences.chinese: 其中三人被逮捕，漏网的一人正在被搜捕人员追查。

sentences.english: The moonshiners had been tipped off that they were Lovely about to be raided.
sentences.chinese: 烈酒走私者得到风声说将对他们开展搜捕。

definition: to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down (the perpetrator of a crime, an escaped prisoner etc)
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down
to try to find out/to trace/to track down
to order the arrest of sb as criminal/to list as wanted
